Title: Relates to payments by a pharmacy benefit manager to in-network pharmacies
Summary: Requires a pharmacy benefit manager to pay an in-network pharmacy at minimum at the national average drug acquisition cost (NADAC) rate, or at the pharmacy acquisition cost rate if greater or there is not a NADAC rate, plus a professional dispensing fee that is at minimum the professional dispensing fee paid under the state medical assistance program.
LawCode: Amd ยง280-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to payments by pharmacy benefit managers to in-network pharmacies
